name: JustDrive // Very Early Access
description:
Hey Visitor!

I am a 17years old hobby game developer from Germany and i am working one my new game "JustDrive". When it is finished, it will be a cool race game. But until now it is not ready for release, right now you can just drive one track, without any opponents, without timecount. So just for drive and testing the performance a bit.

When you buy this game you support me and you will get all further updates for free. You will get a heavy discount if you buy it now!

But remember, the game isnt finished yet!
